cause.description:
Lt. Col. Andrew Horne is an Iraq war vet who is a national spokesman for VoteVets.org and the Iraq Summer Campaign. He also Delivered the Democratic response to George Bush's radio address in Mach 2007.
There is no one running against Mitch McConnell right now and Andrew Horne would be the best candidate to take him on.
In 2006 Andrew took his first step in to politics by running in the Democratic primary to take on US Rep Ann Northup. Although he lost the primary Andrew never lost sight of what was important ending the war in Iraq
1. Andrew Horne must run for Senate
2. There must be an end to the Iraq War
3. Mitch McConnell must be Ditched
cause.mission: To Draft and Elect Andrew Horne to the US Senate by Ditching Mitch McConnell
cause.name: END THE WAR, Draft Lt. Col. Andrew Horne US Senate
